title: An Act relative to sudden cardiac arrest awareness

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Velis, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 1631) of John C. Velis for legislation relative to sudden cardiac arrest awareness.  Public Health.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Health
